languages.text: {n}Панель управления зенитного орудия изобилует множеством непонятных рычажков и кнопок. Быстро отключить ее не выйдет — только взорвать, уничтожив полностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Панель управления пушки изобилует множеством непонятных рычажков и кнопок. Быстро отключить ее не выйдет — только взорвать, уничтожив полностью.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Панель управления зенитного орудия изобилует множеством непонятных рычажков и кнопок. Быстро отключить ее не выйдет — только взорвать, уничтожив полностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cannon's dashboard has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly isn't an option. All that's left is to blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
{n}The cannon's dashboard has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly isn't an option. All that's left is to blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
{n}The cannon's dashboard has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly isn't an option. All that's left is to blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
{n}The cannon's dashboard has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly isn't an option. All that's left is to blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
{n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}
{n}The cannon's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Steuerkonsole der Flugabwehrbatterie ist ein Labyrinth aus mysteriösen Hebeln und Knöpfen. Ihre schnelle Deaktivierung ist keine Option. Du kannst sie nur sprengen und vollständig zerstören.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Steuerkonsole der Kanone ist ein einziges Labyrinth aus mysteriösen Hebeln und Knöpfen. Es wird nicht möglich sein, sie schnell zu deaktivieren. Es bleibt dir nur eines: Sie in die Luft sprengen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le panneau de contrôle de la batterie antiaérienne présente toute une panoplie de boutons et de leviers mystérieux. Il n'est pas envisageable de la désactiver rapidement. La seule solution consiste à la faire sauter pour la détruire complètement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le panneau de contrôle du canon comporte une panoplie de boutons et de leviers mystérieux. Il n'est pas envisageable de le désactiver rapidement. La seule solution consiste à le faire sauter pour le détruire complètement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}防空炮的操作面板上到处都是神秘的拉杆与按钮，你无法快速停下来这门大炮。你唯一能做的事情就是把它炸掉，将它彻底摧毁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}防空炮的操作面板上到处都是神秘的拉杆与按钮，你无法快速停下来这门大炮。唯一合适的方法就是把它炸掉，彻底摧毁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}対空砲の制御盤には謎のレバーやボタンがたくさん並んでいる。それをすぐに停止させるという選択肢はない。唯一残された手段は、爆破して完全に破壊してしまうことぐらいだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大砲のダッシュボードには謎のレバーやボタンがたくさん並んでいる。それをすぐに停止させるという選択肢はない。残された手段は、爆破して完全に破壊してしまうことぐらいだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El panel de control de la batería antiaérea tiene un sinfín de palancas y botones misteriosos. Desactivarla rápidamente no es una opción. Solo queda volarla, destruyéndola por completo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El panel de mandos del cañón tiene un sinfín de palancas y botones misteriosos. Desactivarlo rápidamente no es una opción. Solo podemos volarlo, destruyéndolo por completo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Havasavar bataryasının kontrol paneli, baştan aşağı gizemli kollar ve düğmelerle kaplı. Hızlı bir şekilde devre dışı bırakmak söz konusu değil. Yapabileceğin tek şey, onu havaya uçurup hepten imha etmek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery's control panel has a panoply of mysterious levers and buttons. Deactivating it quickly is not an option. All you can do is blow it up, destroying it completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Havasavar bataryasının kontrol paneli, baştan aşağı gizemli kollar ve düğmelerle kaplı. Hızlı bir şekilde devre dışı bırakmak söz konusu değil. Yapabileceğin tek şey, onu havaya uçurup hepten imha etmek.{/n}
